properties.Name: CustomerBehavioralCriteria
properties.Description:
The one or more behavioral criteria that are assigned or linked to a Customer and by which they are identified or qualified from a behavioral focus.

Note:
This entity can be linked to PRODUCT if behavior is needed to be tracked for specific products.   This is normally done in models that have a specific industry-context such as the enterprise models.

Behavioral market segmentation is based upon how consumers behave or use a products and the corresponding buying, consumption or usage patterns that result.    

An example of a behavioral criteria is when they buy a product (special occasions, Christmas, anniversaries) or how often they buy that product (occasional purchases, frequent purchases).

The business organization identifies a finite number of Behavioral Criteria that are used to identify customers and prospective customers.   

The Behavioral Criteria is the specific criteria or value that may be linked to a Market Segment.

The Behavioral Criteria Type is the larger category to which the Behavioral Criteria belongs.

The following are examples:

Behavioral Criteria: Impulse shopper
Behavioral Criteria Type:  Purchasing Pattern

Behavioral Criteria: End Of Week
Behavioral Criteria Type: Purchasing Pattern

Behavioral Criteria: Aggressive 
Behavioral Criteria Type: Investment Style

Behavioral Criteria: Business Communications
Behavioral Criteria Type: Cellular Phone Usage

Behavioral Criteria: Evening and Weekends
Behavioral Criteria Type: Electricity Usage

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: BehavioralCriteriaId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Behavioral Criteria.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: CustomerBehavioralCriteriaNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information related to Customer Behavioral Criteria.
